Your employment with EPAM remains at-will, absent a specific agreement in writing to the contrary, signed by the Chief People Officer, Chief Executive Officer, or Chief Financial Officer, of the company. At-will means that both you and EPAM maintain the right to separate the employment relationship at any time, and for any reason.
